author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
There's a lot of talk of the death of Xorg, and whilst Wayland is the direction that thing are moving that doesn't mean that if you hate it then you can't change that course. That doesn't mean going and getting angry, it means actually going and getting involved in the future of projects you support.
